# Recipes

Hello, in the following you will see some interesting recipes that I found to sound delicious.

## **Carrot cake**

*Vegan*

**Ingredients**

#### Batter

250g Carrots

125g Vegan Butter at room temperature

100g sugar/maple syrup

1 pinch salt

1 pinch vanilla extract

2 flax eggs

125g all-purpose flour

1/2 tsp cinnamon

1 1/2 tsp baking powder

100g almonds

1 tsp apple cider vinegar

1/2 tsp baking soda

#### Cream

200g cream cheese

80g powdered sugar

squeeze of lemon juice

optional: vanilla extract
